Text: I can't load the sub files....why is that!?
It has hardcoded English subtitles. I do not recommend downloading this one, unless yo don't bother watching an "unclean" version.

HAHAHAHA! UNCLEAN! YOU'RE SO COOL! YOUR A PURIST!

who cares enjoy the master of cinematography any way you want
Arigato gozaimasu! Have been looking forward to this for a while.
The movie is hardcoded in English. Using subtitles in other language is possible by downloading external subtitles on the internet, but may overlap on the screen due to the hardcoded subtitle.

Classic movie quality by the way.
